alert.note: Alert for Coastal Franklin; Coastal Gulf; Inland Franklin; Inland Gulf (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 12:58PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Gulf and western Franklin Counties through 145 PM EDT/1245 PM CDT/... At 1257 PM EDT/1157 AM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 12 miles northwest of Eastpoint to 7 miles west of Apalachicola to 11 miles southeast of Port St. Joe. Movement was northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Eastpoint, Apalachicola, Franklin, Nine Mile, Buck Siding, Morgan Place, High Bluff, Eleven Mile, Thirteen Mile, Odena, Tilton, Beverly, Bay City, Howard Creek, Apalachicola Airport, Creels, Hays Place and Fort Gadsden. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Franklin; Coastal Gulf; Inland Franklin; Inland Gulf
